annotations: Today since we came we 've been talking about this phrase domestic brand , ah , but what exactly does it mean .
Because we also know that actually the engines in some models of Chery are not made by the company itself , so how do we explain domestic brand .
Domestic brand , eh , actually is just what the name implies , eh , this , it 's our own baby .
That is , the baby son is not adopted , but our very own .
Well , your own baby 's arms and legs can be bought from other people and put on .
So , so , eh , among these kinds of domestic brands , there is still some distance between the complete brand and the product .

Because the brand , eh , it incorporates the product , ah , incorporates the company , ah , incorporates a lot of content , and includes its denotation and its connotation , many emotional things , while the product itself , eh , is an expression of the brand , ah .
So , how should we view this part of the product .
We think that , eh , it is exactly , eh , in the process of independent innovation , then , we ca n't completely cut ourselves off from the outside world .
Because , for example , at present , we of are still using , using some chips from abroad as some of our chips in computers .
So this entire process is a process of how to transform the main parts and the core parts by phases .
First we must have our own brands , first we must have the main part of our own product .
Then we must gradually , step by step perfect the core part , eh , through , step by step , importation , digesting and absorbing .
